name: Homeworld: Cataclysm
description:
Homeworld: Cataclysm is a strategy game developed by Barking Dog Studios. It was originally released in 2000. Sierra On-Line published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Homeworld: Cataclysm has a score of 89. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Homeworld: Cataclysm on PC.
Greg Sabitz and Paul Ruskay scored the game.
